title: Dwelligence
points: A real estate search platform that overlays commute intelligence onto property listings, enabling users to evaluate housing by travel time to their workplace with an interactive map interface and AI-powered neighborhood insights.

title: MetroWage
points: A web application that calculates personalized living wages across Metro Vancouver municipalities, helping families and individuals understand the true cost of living in different regions through interactive geospatial visualizations.

title: MoodMirror
points: An application that analyzes facial expressions to detect and mirror user emotions using computer vision and machine learning techniques.

title: Crash-stradamus
points: A machine learning project that predicts traffic accident severity using data analysis and predictive modeling techniques.

title: JobJug
points: An AI-powered job application tracker that automatically categorizes your job applications into their respective stages of the hiring process.

title: Moments
points: A unique journaling platform that integrates interactive geospatial features, enabling users to reflect on their experiences by creating geographic 'memos'.

title: Nuisance Report Tracker
points: A web application that allows users to report and track neighborhood nuisances, such as potholes and graffiti, on an interactive map.

title: JapanGo
points: A language-learning web application that pits players against each other in a Japanese vocabulary competition using real-time WebSocket connections.

title: IUPAC Discord Quiz Bot
points: A Discord bot that helps students master IUPAC naming conventions for organic chemical compounds through interactive quizzes in a text channel.
